headline: Engine Capital Is Pushing For Strategic Review Of Lyft
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Engine Capital has taken a stake in Lyft Inc. and is pushing for a strategic review of the ride-hailing app, according to a letter reviewed by Bloomberg News. headline: Uber Freight’s Powerloop begins offering dedicated tours to carriers
summary: Carriers in the Powerloop dedicated tours program commit to at least a two-week period of hauling freight using Powerloop trailers. But they can select specific loads within a tour or haul their own loads using a Powerloop trailer. The post Uber Freight’s Powerloop begins offering dedicated tours to carriers appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Gig Economy Stocks to Consider Amid Rising Industry Growth
summary: The gig economy is gaining in popularity and holds immense potential. If you wish to capitalize on this trend, focusing on stocks like Angi, Uber and DoorDash appears prudent.

headline: Uber Eats and Sally Beauty Partner to Offer On-Demand Delivery of Beauty Supplies Nationwide
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, March 25, 2025--Starting today, customers can shop hair care, nail products, and more from Sally Beauty locations nationwide through the Uber Eats app.

headline: 1 Unstoppable Stock That Could Beat Tesla to This $14 Trillion Opportunity
summary: Ark Investment Management, which was founded by prolific technology investor Cathie Wood, thinks the autonomous ride-hailing industry could generate $14 trillion in enterprise value by 2027.  Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA) is a leading developer of self-driving technologies, and its new Cybercab robotaxi -- which will be able to haul passengers with no human input -- could hit American roads as soon as this year.  Instead, I think Uber Technologies (NYSE: UBER) has the potential to capture a much bigger share of this new, multitrillion-dollar market.
